results.title:
The Sapphires
Julie (Jessica Mauboy) costume
results.credit_line: Courtesy the National Film and Sound Archive of Australia
results.brief_description: This form-fitting blue sequin dress worn be Julie (Jessica Mauboy) in The Sapphires (2012) is front and centre in the true story of an Indigenous singing group who entertained troops during the Vietnam War.
results.description: This form-fitting blue sequin dress worn be Julie (Jessica Mauboy) in The Sapphires (2012) is front and centre in the true story of an Indigenous singing group who entertained troops during the Vietnam War.
